title: Unable to log in -> stuck on "Authenticating" (EUW)
body:
Cheers everyone.

I've found plenty of recent threads about this, but none of them featured the required information to fix the problem. I've tried the Hextech fixing thing, forwarded ports, reinstalled, made sure everything's in order with Microsoft Edge, restarted my PC and more. The issue persists throughout different accounts, but ONLY on EU West, my home server.
My provider is Vodafone GmbH in Germany.

Any help is highly appreciated.

Best regards


EDIT: Restarting my router appears to have fixed it. Disconnected from chat so far, but that may be unrelated.
EDIT 2: It's actually even worse now. I got into a game but it can't start because of "connectivity issues". No loading screen.

replies.body:
It sounds like you've got some connection instabilities if it's fluctuating like this.  it's really important that you start off by going through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  This will help rule out possibilities as well as strengthen any instabilities causing this.  You'll want to test it in a custom though to prevent any penalties.  

I know you've tried some steps and reviewed other threads, but many cases are unique and this will help by ruling out the most basic steps.  Let me know your results!
